products.name: ProdigyRP 2.6 UI Pack
products.description: A collection of custom UI elements inspired by ProdigyRP 2.6. This pack includes various UI components, menus, and interactive elements to enhance your roleplay experience.

products.name: ProdigyRP 2.6 Target
products.description: An advanced targetting system inspired by ProdigyRP 2.6. This package includes a customizable target HUD, interactable features, and an enhanced customization menu to improve your gameplay experience.

products.name: ProdigyRP 2.6 Bundle
products.description: A bundle including the advanced targetting system and custom UI elements inspired by ProdigyRP 2.6. This package offers a comprehensive upgrade to your roleplay experience with enhanced visuals and interactive features.
